content:
Like I mean just even looking at that kind of the market that’s out there and I think companies are looking at ways to get out there and capture as much of the methane as possible, which I view is a great sign toward added supply and just really… 
 It gives me a great confidence because I hear about some of the -- where would you say the -- where some of these other technologies are and what is going to be required for them to deploy and develop and where we are and where we can deliver and the level of carbon reductions we can do -- I mean, frankly, there aren't any others that are really talking about kind of the reductions in carbon that we are.
